AMM.name: AMM
AMM.description: An Automated Market Maker Protocol relies on smart contracts to automate price matching or discovery

uniswapV2.name: Uniswap V2 AMM
uniswapV2.description: An AMM using Uniswap's V2 codebase for swaps

masterChef.name: MasterChef
masterChef.description: A system to distribute tokens directly from the token minting contract. Leverages pools within a common smart contract

stakingRewards.name: Staking Rewards
stakingRewards.description: An individual staking pool to distribute tokens

autoCompounder.name: Auto-compounder
autoCompounder.description: A vault or deposit address that provides access to the amortization of costs for compounding rewards or interest

ERC20.name: ERC20
ERC20.description: Ethereum Request for Comment 20 (ERC-20) is the implemented standard for fungible tokens created using the Ethereum blockchain. ERC-20 guides the creation of new tokens on the Ethereum blockchain so that they are interchangeable with other tokens used within smart contracts.

lostToken.name: Lost Token
lostToken.description: The LOST Token is a governance, access and rewards representation of the Lost Worlds ecosystem. It has 50 Million hard-cap supply compatible with the Avalanche network.

governance.name: Governance
governance.description: A governance token is a cryptocurrency that gives its holders a right to vote on proposed changes.

vault.name: Vault
vault.description: A destination deposit location that provides a mapping of ownership or receipt token.

proxy.name: Proxy
proxy.description: A smart contract that references or acts as a pass-through for another contract.

wrapped.name: Wrapped Token
wrapped.description: A wrapped token is a smart contract that takes an existing asset and provides an alternative version according to some standard that represents the value.
